Articles.Content:
Hi all.

Just 1 question. How to make a log of all the sensors on the spaceship and export them for example in excel to build charts (like temperature - time)?

ÃÂ©ptions without mods - is preferable.

The base game does not currently provide any means to do this. There is a great plugin called Graphotron, though, which allows you to export readings from any sensor on your ship as well as other data, such as the ship's altitude. You can see it plot a graph in-game, export an image of the graph, or export the actual data to make your own graphs with.
